articles.author: Karim Zidan
articles.title: Donald Trump gloats about USA’s Women’s World Cup elimination - The Guardian
articles.description: Ex-president’s open criticism of team started in 2019, when Megan Rapinoe said she wouldn’t visit White House after winning
articles.content: Less than 24 hours after the US womens national team suffered a shocking defeat at the hands of their longtime nemesis Sweden in the second round of the 2023 Womens World Cup, Donald Trump gloated ab… [+9167 chars]
